bill.title: Department of Agriculture; consolidate certain agencies, boards and commissions under the authority of.
bill.description: An Act To Consolidate The Mississippi Board Of Animal Health And The Mississippi Fair Commission With The Mississippi Department Of Agriculture And Commerce; To Provide For The Transfer Of Personnel And Resources Of The Mississippi Board Of Animal Health To The Department Of Agriculture And Commerce; To Provide That The Mississippi Board Of Animal Health Shall Be An Advisory Board To The Department Of Agriculture And Commerce; To Amend Sections 69-15-2 And 69-15-9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform; To Provide For The Transfer Of Personnel And Resources Of The Mississippi Fair Commission To The Department Of Agriculture And Commerce; To Provide That The Mississippi Fair Commission Shall Be An Advisory Commission To The Department Of Agriculture And Commerce; To Bring Forward Sections 69-1-1 And 69-1-203, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Establish And Prescribe The Functions Of The Department Of Agriculture And Commerce, For Purposes Of Possible Amendments; To Bring Forward Section 49-19-1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Make The State Forestry Commission An Advisory Board To The Department Of Agriculture And Commerce And To The Office Of Forestry Within Such Department; To Bring Forward Sections 49-19-1 Through 49-19-15, 49-19-19, 49-19-21, 49-19-25, 49-19-27, 49-19-31, 49-19-65, 49-19-67, 49-19-71, 49-19-73, 49-19-111 Through 49-19-117, 49-19-205, 49-19-207, 49-19-211 Through 49-19-227, 49-19-305, 49-19-307, 49-19-351, 51-3-103, 51-3-105, 51-9-107, 51-11-5, 51-11-9, 51-13-105, 51-13-107, 53-7-11, 53-7-29, 53-9-11, 55-3-1, 55-3-11, 55-3-19, 55-3-21, 55-3-23, 29-3-27, 29-3-45, 29-3-47, 29-3-49, 29-3-54, 29-3-85, 29-3-87, 49-7-203, 69-3-1, 69-29-1, 69-31-1, 69-37-5, 69-45-5, 69-46-3, 69-47-1 And 79-22-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Are Provisions Relating To The Establishment And Responsibilities Of The State Forestry Commission, For Purposes Of Possible Amendments; To Bring Forward Sections 69-27-2, 69-27-7, 69-27-9, 69-27-13, 69-27-301, 69-27-331 And 69-28-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Establish And Prescribe The Powers, Duties And Responsibilities Of The State Soil And Water Conservation Commission; To Bring Forward Sections 73-39-53 And 73-39-55, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Establish The Mississippi Board Of Veterinary Medicine, For Purposes Of Possible Amendments; To Bring Forward Section 69-5-1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Establishes The Mississippi Fair Commission, For Purposes Of Possible Amendments; To Bring Forward Sections 69-7-251, 69-7-253 And 69-7-255, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Establish The Egg Marketing Board, For Purposes Of Possible Amendments; To Bring Forward Sections 73-36-3, 73-36-9, 73-36-17 And 73-36-19, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Establish The State Board Of Registration For Foresters, For Purposes Of Possible Amendments; And For Related Purposes.
